# Mind Ease - Pomodoro Timer Backend

## Project Overview
Node.js TypeScript backend for a Pomodoro timer application with authentication, session tracking, and analytics.

## Tech Stack
- Node.js + TypeScript
- Fastify (web framework)
- Prisma ORM
- PostgreSQL
- JWT authentication
- Zod validation
